Orders for Plastic Cards placed before 1PM EST will be processed the same day and shipped according to the shipping option chosen. Orders placed after 1PM EST will be processed the following day and shipped according to the shipping option chosen. Orders for Plastic Cards placed on legal holidays will be processed the following business day and shipped according to the shipping option chosen.
